configuration_json.formula: if (eating_window_duration <= window_threshold) then success_value else failure_value

schema.description: SC-BINARY-DAILY: Daily pass/fail based on staying within 8-hour eating window every day

metadata.recommendation_text: Every day of the week, keep all eating within an 8-hour window (e.g., first meal at 10am, last meal by 6pm)

analysis.reasoning: SC-BINARY-DAILY: Daily evaluation pattern since requirement is every single day
